name: MISP Connector App
description: Blocks domains and IPs based on MISP (Malware Information Sharing Platform) IOCs.

fields.name: enableBlocking
fields.label: Enable Blocking
fields.help: Enable or disable blocking based on MISP IOCs

fields.name: mispApiKey
fields.label: MISP API Key
fields.help: API key for MISP server authentication

fields.name: maxIocAge
fields.label: Max IOC Age
fields.help: Maximum age of IOCs to use (e.g., '30d', '7d', '1w')

fields.name: allowTxtBlockingReport
fields.label: Allow TXT Blocking Report
fields.help: Allow TXT queries to return blocking information

fields.name: paginationLimit
fields.label: Pagination Limit
fields.help: Maximum number of IOCs to fetch per page

fields.name: addExtendedDnsError
fields.label: Add Extended DNS Error
fields.help: Add extended DNS error information to responses
